name: Without End
description:
Without End is a story heavy, turn based, experimental RPG, following the every day life of a high schooler and his friends.

Features:

-An engaging short (5-6 hour) story

-Decisions with weight, causing the world to evolve

-High replayability with multiple endings

-Unique enemies who remember your actions

-Bad jokes (in case you don't like good ones)

-5 memorable party members with unique skills and play styles

This game involves mental health and may not be suitable for people with trauma or suicidal inclinations.
